title: Which Skin line will Ahri invade next? [Poll]
body: We havent talked about Ahri skins in a while.

replies.body: Where is the "All of the above" choice?
I rly wish next Ahri skin is a more dark vibe line, like Dark Star or Coven. For the sake of difference. Even if it's in 10 years
Blood Moon. Every champ is getting a Blood Moon skin and Ahri is getting every skin, its gona happen.
Yes pls. But more like Evelynn and Elise, not neutral and dignified like Diana (she looks very good, but Ahri already has many dignified skins)

That's a good call. I could see a "Deathsworn" or "Underworld"-type Ahri skin be pretty cool. For all of her skins, she really doesn't have anything too menacing, which is especially weird given her theme...
Deathsworn or Soulstealer... It could be even a ultimate that she becomes more demon-like the more kills you get (so I would stay with an angelic Ahri because I'm Wood VI division :'D)

Given all the skins, I can't even remember what her theme is. 

Isn't Ahri a K-pop star, the lead singer for the group K/DA?

Indeed, she also lack a kind of horrific/aggressive skinline other than foxfire (and foxfire is an old skin) and I think it could make a good fit to take a "sexy" character and make it different. Quite sure people wouldn't be angry at this.
Isn't Midnight sorta in that direction? Except for animations I guess
